name: cloudflare
description: Cloudflare Workers deployment for hello-world architecture

scripts.deploy: npm run build:workers && CLOUDFLARE_API_TOKEN=$(npx wrangler auth token --json | jq -r .token) cdktf deploy --auto-approve
scripts.destroy: CLOUDFLARE_API_TOKEN=$(npx wrangler auth token --json | jq -r .token) cdktf destroy --auto-approve
